name: "ArtaTex" Factory
par1: The textile factory is located in the municipality of Peja, along the Peja - Mitrovica main road. The facility will have access to the south-east main road, while the longitudinal axis of the building is in the south-east-west direction.
par2: The placement of the facility, the factory yard and the greenery surfaces are designed as a whole. The building is developed on two levels, the ground and the first floor and the functional aspect of the facility is divided into four groups: administration, production, storage, and utility.
